verses.verse: Now the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> had a very <WH3966> great <WH6099> multitude <WH7227> of cattle <WH4735>: and when they saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the land <WH776> of Jazer <WH3270>, and the land <WH776> of Gil`ad <WH1568>, that, behold, the place <WH4725> was a place <WH4725> for cattle <WH4735>;

The children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> came <WH935> <WH8799> and spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, and to Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and unto the princes <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Ataroth <WH5852>, and Dibon <WH1769>, and Jazer <WH3270>, and Nimrah <WH5247>, and Heshbon <WH2809>, and Elealeh <WH500>, and SH'vam <WH7643>, and N'vo <WH5015>, and Beon <WH1194>,

Havahn the country <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> smote <WH5221> <WH8689> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, is a land <WH776> for cattle <WH4735>, and thy servants <WH5650> have cattle <WH4735>:

Wherefore, said <WH559> <WH8799> they, if we have found <WH4672> <WH8804> grace <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, let this land <WH776> be given <WH5414> <WH8714> unto thy servants <WH5650> for a possession <WH272>, and bring us not over <WH5674> <WH8686> Yarden <WH3383>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and to the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205>, Shall your brethren <WH251> go <WH935> <WH8799> to war <WH4421>, and shall ye sit <WH3427> <WH8799> here?

And wherefore discourage ye <WH5106> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH5106> <WH8799> the heart <WH3820> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from going over <WH5674> <WH8800> into the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> them?
Thus did <WH6213> <WH8804> your fathers <WH1>, when I sent <WH7971> <WH8800> them from Kadeshbarnea <WH6947> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> the land <WH776>.

For when they went up <WH5927> <WH8799> unto the valley <WH5158> of Eshcol <WH812>, and saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the land <WH776>, they discouraged <WH5106> <WH8686> the heart <WH3820> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that they should not go <WH935> <WH8800> into the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> had given <WH5414> <WH8804> them.
And the YY'S <WH3068> anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> the same time <WH3117>, and he sware <WH7650> <WH8735>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Surely <WH518> none of the men <WH582> that came up <WH5927> <WH8802> out of Egypt <WH4714>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> the land <WH127> which I sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto Avraham <WH85>, unto Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and unto Ya`akov <WH3290>; because they have not wholly <WH4390> <WH8765> followed <WH310> me:

Save Kalev <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Y'funeh <WH3312> the Kenezite <WH7074>, and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>: for they have wholly <WH4390> <WH8765> followed <WH310> the YY <WH3068>.

And the YY'S <WH3068> anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> <WH8799> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and he made them wander <WH5128> <WH8686> in the wilderness <WH4057> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, until all the generation <WH1755>, that had done <WH6213> <WH8802> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, was consumed <WH8552> <WH8800>.

And, behold, ye are risen up <WH6965> <WH8804> in your fathers <WH1> ' stead, an increase <WH8635> of sinful <WH2400> men <WH582>, to augment <WH5595> <WH8800> yet the fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> toward Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

For if ye turn away <WH7725> <WH8799> from after <WH310> him, he will yet again <WH3254> <WH8804> leave <WH3240> <WH8687> them in the wilderness <WH4057>; and ye shall destroy <WH7843> <WH8765> all this people <WH5971>.

And they came near <WH5066> <WH8799> unto him, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, We will build <WH1129> <WH8799> sheepfolds <WH1448> <WH6629> here for our cattle <WH4735>, and cities <WH5892> for our little ones <WH2945>:

But we ourselves <WH587> will go ready <WH2363> <WH8803> armed <WH2502> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, until we have brought <WH935> <WH8689> them unto their place <WH4725>: and our little ones <WH2945> shall dwell <WH3427> <WH8804> in the fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892> because <WH6440> of the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of the land <WH776>.
We will not return <WH7725> <WH8799> unto our houses <WH1004>, until the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> have inherited <WH5157> <WH8692> every man <WH376> his inheritance <WH5159>.

For we will not inherit <WH5157> <WH8799> with them on yonder side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383>, or forward <WH1973>; because our inheritance <WH5159> is fallen <WH935> <WH8804> to us on this side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383> eastward <WH4217>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, If ye will do <WH6213> <WH8799> this thing <WH1697>, if ye will go armed <WH2502> <WH8735> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> to war <WH4421>,

And will go <WH5674> all of you armed <WH2502> <WH8803> over <WH5674> <WH8804> Yarden <WH3383> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, until he hath driven out <WH3423> <WH8687> his enemies <WH341> <WH8802> from before <WH6440> him,

And the land <WH776> be subdued <WH3533> <WH8738> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: then afterward <WH310> ye shall return <WH7725> <WH8799>, and be guiltless <WH5355> before the YY <WH3068>, and before Yisra'EL <WH3478>; and this land <WH776> shall be your possession <WH272> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>.
But if ye will not do so <WH6213> <WH8799>, behold, ye have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against the YY <WH3068>: and be sure <WH3045> <WH8798> your sin <WH2403> will find you out <WH4672> <WH8799>.

Build <WH1129> <WH8798> you cities <WH5892> for your little ones <WH2945>, and folds <WH1448> for your sheep <WH6792>; and do <WH6213> <WH8799> that which hath proceeded <WH3318> <WH8802> out of your mouth <WH6310>.

And the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thy servants <WH5650> will do <WH6213> <WH8799> as my lord <WH113> commandeth <WH6680> <WH8764>.
Our little ones <WH2945>, our wives <WH802>, our flocks <WH4735>, and all our cattle <WH929>, shall be there in the cities <WH5892> of Gil`ad <WH1568>:

But thy servants <WH5650> will pass over <WH5674> <WH8799>, every man armed <WH2502> <WH8803> for war <WH6635>, before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> to battle <WH4421>, as my lord <WH113> saith <WH1696> <WH8802>.

So concerning them Mosheh <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> Eleazar <WH499> the Kohen <WH3548>, and Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and the chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1> of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>:

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, If the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> will pass with you over <WH5674> <WH8799> Yarden <WH3383>, every man armed <WH2502> <WH8803> to battle <WH4421>, before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, and the land <WH776> shall be subdued <WH3533> <WH8738> before <WH6440> you; then ye shall give <WH5414> <WH8804> them the land <WH776> of Gil`ad <WH1568> for a possession <WH272>:
But if they will not pass over <WH5674> <WH8799> with you armed <WH2502> <WH8803>, they shall have possessions <WH270> <WH8738> among <WH8432> you in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>.

And the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> answered <WH6030> <WH8799>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, As the YY <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> <WH8765> unto thy servants <WH5650>, so will we do <WH6213> <WH8799>.

We will <WH5168> pass over <WH5674> <WH8799> armed <WH2502> <WH8803> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> into the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, that the possession <WH272> of our inheritance <WH5159> on this side <WH5676> Yarden <WH3383> may be ours.

And Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> unto them, even to the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410>, and to the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205>, and unto half <WH2677> the tribe <WH7626> of M'nasheh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Yosef <WH3130>, the kingdom <WH4467> of Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, and the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, the land <WH776>, with the cities <WH5892> thereof in the coasts <WH1367>, even the cities <WH5892> of the country <WH776> round about <WH5439>.
And the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> built <WH1129> <WH8799> Dibon <WH1769>, and Ataroth <WH5852>, and Aroer <WH6177>,
And Atroth, Shophan <WH5855>, and Jaazer <WH3270>, and Jogbehah <WH3011>,
And Bethnimrah <WH1039>, and Bethharan <WH1028>, fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892>: and folds <WH1448> for sheep <WH6629>.
And the children <WH1121> of Re'uven <WH7205> built <WH1129> <WH8804> Heshbon <WH2809>, and Elealeh <WH500>, and Kirjathaim <WH7156>,

And N'vo <WH5015>, and Baalmeon <WH1186>, (their names <WH8034> being changed <WH4142> <WH8716>,) and Shibmah <WH7643>: and gave <WH7121> <WH8799> other names <WH8034> <WH8034> unto the cities <WH5892> which they builded <WH1129> <WH8804>.

And the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519> went <WH3212> <WH8799> to Gil`ad <WH1568>, and took <WH3920> <WH8799> it, and dispossessed <WH3423> <WH8686> the Amorite <WH567> which was in it.
And Mosheh <WH4872> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> Gil`ad <WH1568> unto Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519>; and he dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> therein.
And Jair <WH2971> the son <WH1121> of M'nasheh <WH4519> went <WH1980> <WH8804> and took <WH3920> <WH8799> the small towns <WH2333> thereof, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> them Havothjair <WH2334>.
And Nobah <WH5025> went <WH1980> <WH8804> and took <WH3920> <WH8799> Kenath <WH7079>, and the villages <WH1323> thereof, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> it Nobah <WH5025>, after his own name <WH8034>.
